programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives continue to investigate a woman's murder and dismemberment by following a lead provided by serial killer Gregory Yates.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson investigates allegations against a popular radio personality; Rollins goes under cover when a shocking confession leads to another crime.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson tries to help a pop star in a volatile relationship; Rollins struggles with taking the stress of work home with her; Fin teaches a rookie a lesson in respecting fellow officers.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the case against a popular sports star falls through, Benson digs into the suspect's past to uncover additional victims; Velasco is disappointed when he meets one of his heroes.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage girl disappears, the squad discovers a suspect who seems to be targeting young, vulnerable women with a similar personal connection; Dr. Huang delves into his past in order to help solve the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the investigation into a missing teen leads the detectives to a severed leg, they are drawn into the world of self-mutilation and ritual amputation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a woman is found dead in her apartment, detectives investigate her personal contacts, including an employer (Kate Burton), in search of suspects.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: DDA Jonah Dekker (Terrence Howard) comes to New York to defend his cousin, who has been accused of rape; ADA Casey Novak (Diane Neal) helps Detectives Stabler and Benson with the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a baby is found on a playground, Detectives Stabler and Benson look for the child's caregiver.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Tutuola dig into the past of a basketball star while investigating sexual abuse charges against his former coach.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler work with a sex therapist, Capt. Jackson (Jeremy Irons), when a young girl is murdered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a girl in foster care is found dead, the detectives probe her family connections in search of a motive and a murderer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler are joined by Briscoe (Jerry Orbach) and Green (Jesse L. Martin) when a 6-year-old shooting victim tests positive for a sexually transmitted disease.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives hunt for a suspect with an ax to grind when an engagement party ends in a quadruple homicide.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Family members become murder suspects when DNA tests on the body of a 16-year-old girl reveal evidence of incest.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives interview an overprotective woman (Diane Verona) to find out why her son is scavenging for food in the garbage; the boy later is later found dead and his older brother confesses to killing him.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The death of a wealthy senior citizen leads to an investigations that uncovers a serial killer who targets the elderly.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an 8-year-old girl is kidnapped on her way home from school, DNA tests on the blood found in the abductor's abandoned van reveal she has leukemia.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A band of overweight teenage siblings attacks a gifted piano student from Harlem.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When detective Benson gets into the middle of an investigation of her brother, the case begins to threaten her career.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate the case of a woman (Cynthia Nixon) with multiple personalities who may have abused and killed her daughter; the detectives must adjust to sweeping changes in the SVU.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: While investigating the death of a teenager, detectives Elliot Stabler and John Munch discover a group of girls in a pregnancy pact.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a disabled woman is beaten and raped, Benson and Stabler think someone close to the victim is responsible.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins' sister stirs up trouble and a possible SVU investigation when she reports a doctor who trades prescription painkillers for sex.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins and Fin investigate an assault in Kentucky that has striking similarities to that of a victim found in Central Park; Benson receives intel that turns the case upside down.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The search for a suspect who drugs women's drinks in crowded bars leads the SVU to Muncy's brother; Churlish makes a risky move to impress Benson.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman turns her husband in for possessing child pornography, the case is complicated by a sudden death; Benson tries to reconnect with a victim she saved.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry is brought in front of The Galactic Housing Council to answer for his crimes.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The death of a young girl appears to link to the world of ultimate fighting, and tensions rise within the department when two brothers (Gaius Charles, Arlen Escarpeta) are charged with the crime.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a girl in foster care is found dead, the detectives probe her family connections in search of a motive and a murderer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler work with a sex therapist, Capt. Jackson (Jeremy Irons), when a young girl is murdered.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Two decades after a Jacksonville, Fla., woman goes missing, her son solves the mystery that haunted his childhood.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: After finding his wife and two children dead, a former Indiana state trooper spends 13 years trying to clear his name.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: After finding his wife and two children dead, a former Indiana state trooper spends 13 years trying to clear his name.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Kensi is transported to a missile launch facility to help thwart a takeover of nuclear weapons.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team must find assailants who illegally crossed the border and attacked California Highway Patrol officers; Homeland Security sends Nell's older and bossy sister to assist with the case.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen and the team question Joelle's backstory after she escapes from a kidnapping and turns to Callen for help.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The search for the sexual abuser of a child leads the detectives to a wealthy toy mogul known for his generous hospitality toward children.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman attempts to kidnap a child she believes is her daughter; while DNA tests are in progress, Benson traces the confusion about the child's origins back to a fertility doctor.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a Chinese woman's daughter is held for ransom by smugglers, the detectives turn to her sister for help.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives investigate when a baby is left abandoned with a note indicating the mother's kidnapping and quickly learn that she has been kidnapped by a copycat serial killer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A professor (Billy Campbell) accused of sexual assault volunteers to submit a DNA sample for testing, but the case turns into a he-said, she-said standoff.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Fin investigate the brutal rape and murder of a prostitute, and the prime suspects turn out to be a group of teens suspected of re-enacting a favorite video game.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives discover that a murdered teenage girl was a prostitute and had contracted HIV while working on a pornographic film, which leads them to her killer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a wealthy couple laundering money for South American drug dealers is murdered, former ADA Alexandra Cabot (Stephanie March) returns from witness protection to help solve the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A home invasion and kidnapping lead the SVU to a shocking discovery; Muncy tries to fit in with the squad.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young man asks the SVU for help when he suspects his boss is preying on his sister; Velasco tries to convince a reluctant witness to testify in court.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU hunts for a violent suspect who killed a detective's child; Rollins ponders a potential opportunity.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi and Rollins work together on an important arraignment; Benson tries to make Noah's Christmas wish come true when a case falls in her lap.

programme.title: Tour de France Cycling
programme.desc: Highlights from stage nine of the 2025 Tour de France, as the peloton takes on a 174km flat route from the historic town of Chinon to the vibrant city of Chateauroux.

programme.title: Giro d'Italia Women
programme.desc: The 2025 Giro d'Italia Women reaches its finale as the riders tackle a 134km route from Forli to the Autodromo Enzo e Dino Ferrari in Imola.

programme.title: TNT Sports Reload
programme.desc: The best bits from TNT Sports over the last week, including exclusive interviews, the best action and so much more.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Newcastle United host West Ham United at St James' Park. Newcastle have lost just one of their last nine league meetings with the Hammers.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Premier League action as West Ham United host Tottenham at London Stadium. The Hammers are looking to do the league double over Tottenham for the first time since 2013/14.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Newcastle United take on Everton at St James' Park. The Toffees have won just one of their last eight midweek games in the league.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Premier League action as Nottingham Forest host Fulham at City Ground. Fulham have won all three of their Premier League games against Forest by an aggregate score of 10-2.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Manchester City take on Aston Villa at the Etihad Stadium. Villa are unbeaten in their last five away games in the league.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Arsenal host Luton Town at Emirates Stadium. The Gunners are unbeaten in their last 38 home league games against promoted sides.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Brentford face Brighton at Gtech Community Stadium. Brighton are winless in all six of their away league games against London sides this season.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Chelsea host Manchester United at Stamford Bridge. Chelsea are winless in their last 12 league games against Man United.

programme.title: Live: Ultimate Pool Pairs Cup
programme.desc: Ultimate Pool action from Group 7 of the Pairs Cup.

programme.title: Tom Aspinall's Fight Lab
programme.desc: Heavyweight champion Tom Aspinall previews Dustin Poirier's final fight, as he takes on old foe Max Holloway at UFC 318 in New Orleans.

programme.title: Fight Week
programme.desc: A preview of UFC 318 at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans, featuring Dustin Poirier's retirement fight against lightweight Max Holloway.

programme.title: The Ultimate Fighting Championship
programme.desc: Action from UFC Fight Night at Bridgestone Arena, Nashville, featuring the showdown between heavyweight knockout artists Derrick Lewis and Tallison Teixeira.

programme.title: Tom Aspinall's Fight Lab
programme.desc: Heavyweight champion Tom Aspinall previews Dustin Poirier's final fight, as he takes on old foe Max Holloway at UFC 318 in New Orleans.

programme.desc: A preview of UFC 318 at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans, featuring Dustin Poirier's retirement fight against lightweight Max Holloway.

programme.title: Tour de France Cycling
programme.desc: Highlights from stage 10 of the 2025 Tour de France, as the riders face big climbs and uphill stretches on a 165km route from Ennezat to Le Mont-Dore.

programme.title: FIA Formula E
programme.desc: Highlights from the 2025 ABB FIA Formula E World Championship and race one at Berlin's iconic Tempelhof Airport circuit.

programme.title: FIA Formula E
programme.desc: Highlights from the 2025 ABB FIA Formula E World Championship and race two at Berlin's iconic Tempelhof Airport circuit.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Liverpool take on Sheffield United at Anfield. Liverpool have won their last six league meetings with the Blades.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Crystal Palace host Manchester City at Selhurst Park. Palace came from 2-0 down to draw 2-2 with City in the reverse fixture in December.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Newcastle United face Tottenham at St James' Park. The Magpies won 6-1 in this same fixture last season.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as West Ham United host title-chasing Liverpool at London Stadium. The Hammers have won just one of their last eight home games in the league.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Aston Villa face Chelsea at Villa Park. The Villans are looking to complete their first league double over Chelsea since 1989/90.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as title challengers Arsenal take on Bournemouth at Emirates Stadium. The Gunners have won 13 of their 15 league games so far in 2024.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Fulham welcome title chasers Manchester City to Craven Cottage. Pep Guardiola's City side are unbeaten in their last 20 league games.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the final day of the Premier League season as Arsenal face Everton at Emirates Stadium. A win for the Gunners could secure their first title win since 2003/04.

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Race action from the Moto3 Grand Prix of Germany at the iconic Sachsenring. Can Jose Antonio Rueda extend his lead at the top of the riders' standings?

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Race action from the Moto2 Grand Prix of Germany at the iconic Sachsenring. Can Spaniard Manuel Gonzalez pick up his fifth win of the season?

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: MotoGP action from the 2025 Grand Prix of Germany Sprint Race at Sachsenring. Can Ducati's Marc Marquez claim yet another Sprint victory?

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Race action from the 2025 MotoGP Grand Prix of Germany at the iconic Sachsenring. Championship leader Marc Marquez is on the hunt for his ninth Germany GP win.

programme.title: MotoGP Chequered Flag
programme.desc: Post-race show featuring analysis, highlights and interviews with all the key riders following the 2025 Grand Prix of Germany at the iconic Sachsenring.

programme.desc: Highlights from round eight of the British Speedway ROWE Motor Oil Premiership as Sheffield Tigers face Oxford Spires at Owlerton Stadium.

programme.desc: Relive all the action and drama from the United Kingdom Round of the 2025 Superbike World Championship.

programme.desc: A look back at the best of the action from the 2025 MotoGP Grand Prix of Germany.
